title: Broadanbig
author: Broadanbig
content: I been dey think say obi get strong supporters but today  wetin  happen shock me. There is this man who claims to be a strong supporter of obi , an igbo man for that matter  who has been shouting obedient disturbing our neighborhood and environs for long now. He has been singing the praise of Obi talking and convincing people to vote for Obi but just today few hours to the general election he goofed. He is the type that talks too much and any how, just this evening I saw him coming with a half bag of rice 25kg to be precise and I asked him he did not say anything, he walked into his compound later on I overheard him telling someone in his compound he saw some people sharing rice in the market and people gathered and was collecting so he went there and he was asked to deposit his PVC to collect the rice he gave them and collected the rice after collecting it he demanded for his PVC and they told him he has already collected the rice and they would not give him back the PVC just few hours to presidential election. What a pity he sold his PVC already that means his voters card and votes throughout this election is gone and these are the people shouting obedient! Obedient!!What a pity.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Broadanbig on February 24, 2023, 06:38:09 PMjust this evening I saw him coming with a half bag of rice 25kg to be precise and I asked him he did not say anything, he walked into his compound later on I overheard him telling someone in his compound he saw some people sharing rice in the market and people gathered and was collecting so he went there and he was asked to deposit his PVC to collect the rice he gave them and collected the rice after collecting it he demanded for his PVC and they told him he has already collected the rice and they would not give him back the PVC It's quite sad to hear that he sold his next 8yrs for a mere small bag of rice because I just pity him and his children for him to have sold this very golden opportunity that he had to have made things right for once in his entire life. The fact remains that "Peter Obi" has the much crowd, and as such both APC and PDP are willing to do anything just the cut short Obi's vote comes tomorrow's election.So right now, it's left for you and me to refuse to sell our vote just like your neighbor did and vote for Peter Obi come tomorrow.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.created_time: February 24, 2023, 08:27:46 PMLast edit: February 24, 2023, 08:40:31 PM by SatoPrincess
comments.body: So this is the trick they want to use to rig the election. Nice one. I’m have always maintained my position that the new naira design did not and cannot stop electoral fraud. So far it has enabled it because people are hungry and do not have access to their money in the banks. There cannot be rigging without the involvement of the people. It’s a shame that when it comes down to doing the right thing, we find ourselves still falling for the same old trick. I saw a video going viral in the early hours of the day, a house of rep member was caught with $500k cash in his custody and he confessed the money was meant for electoral fraud. It pains me to see all this happening at a time Nigerians have decided to trust the system and cast their vote even Nigerians in diaspora came back home just to vote. What’s your excuse not to have? I have my pvc and I’m not afraid to vote. https://punchng.com/breaking-polls-rivers-rep-member-arrested-with-foreign-currency/?amp

Maybe if them announced am before asking, he would have had a second thought. Share nothing dey surprised me again for this country as politicians dey look for new means to use rig this election. Now no be vote buying again since dat update dun cast, na PVC adoption dem dey do now.As election dey go on so, is better you don't go out there to sell your vote or vote under pressure. If you know say you no sabi who go fit lead this country go forward den stay house make ur vote no go be the reason wey another incompetent man go enter that site. If dem dey offer hangout without any repercussion like wetin OP talk, take am but still vote who you believe go deliver even though him people no dey bribe you.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Quote from: Broadanbig on February 24, 2023, 06:38:09 PM. What a pity he sold his PVC already that means his voters card and votes throughout this election is gone and these are the people shouting obedient! Obedient!!What a pity.I don't know why some people are chameleon, they say this in public and do the opposite secretly, I will say that your neighbour is a coward. He sold his vote that can change his present situation to a better one just to satisfy one or two days hungry,it is sad to know that some peraonst only think of today and don't think about tomorrow. Down here in my hood,politicians bought over the INEC officials and they couldn't carry out their duties. Only God will help us in this country. So many wrong decisions wey we make due to our greed na e put keep this country like this.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: What i mostly noticed is that hunger in the country can make you take unnecessary actions and decisions, I don't blame the villagers and those who often sells their right due to money. Just take for instance I traveled home for my grandma burial and then few people approached me asking me assistance with at least little that I can help. As I tried shared new 500 note to 6 persons, omo see as them rush me and even those who manages to collect the just 5h was appreciating me like as if I given them millions. Oya compared someone they offered 25k of rice worth about $50 with the hungry at hand. Don't blame them very soon people will bring their children for exchange of food because of the hardship in the country.

comments.author: Clark Anderson
comments.body: With what is going on now, I now understand Nigerians clearly.they are not straight forward they do things out of thinking. I also noticed that all the people shouting and disturbing my ear with vote obi have finally went to vote for APC, and this is very annoying. This election has already been rigged. with all the news and everything I'm hearing now I know that apc has already made huge plans ahead of the results with the help of inec. I just pray that God delivers Nigeria oooo

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: Wow it's really a big shame to him, not to all obedient supporters because I know full well that some many obedient supporters have vow never to accept a thing like that no matter what happens,so we know that things of this nature will surely happen, even in the bible Judas sell Jesus Christ,so it is not a new thing.and no matter the bribing and corruption that might have have happened during this presidential election, the plan of God must come to pass, because you can bribe man but you cannot bribe God..

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: It is really a pity though but I had to think about it. People are really going through lots, if they see any opportunities they do not mind compromising so as to sort things themselves. Most people do not really have that control over themselves and can not resist situation in which they find themselves in. In this case, I would not really blame him to have taken such decision OP because I believe there are things going on which must have prompted him to act that way. That aside, looking at the current situation now it seems the vote counting has gone wrong as there are many complaints coming in from different polling units in respect to the results so looking at all these things put together how would one be encouraged to vote? You vote and your vote does not count how do you explain that. I would not blame him for the decision he took though maybe he has foreseen what might likely happen so instead of him wasting his time  he just decided to do the needful at the earliest stage.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: E dey really bad say Dem no gree give am en PVC again, but sincerely I believe say the man no know say Dem go seize en PVC if en submit am first to collect the rice..But in another way round shall people dey go through a lot for this country oo, hunger and starvation just because of the monetary issues, so e no really dey easy for somebody to see food now come reject am oo, except say na person wey really get self respect and go fit endure hunger,soo to me I no go really blame anybody wey misbehave with maybe their votes or voters card this time, because the suffering alone this time fit make person do something stupid just for food.

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: In fact, I'm not sure what to call this kind of behavior, but it makes me feel awful to see a Nigerian selling his or her vote in light of the wasteful state of the nation brought on by corrupt governments. I don't even think anyone will be motivated to vote against this time around. If we continue to sell our votes, we will never have good governments because bad politicians will always spend a lot of money buying votes in order to gain power instead of working hard for it and then later steal because they spent a lot of money on their campaign.

If we continue to sell our votes, we will never have good governments because bad politicians will always spend a lot of money buying votes in order to gain power instead of working hard for it and then later steal because they spent a lot of money on their campaign.This one wey you talk like this na serious matter because na wetin I don dey Yan my padi men Dem but them no want to understand me. You see ehn even normal human being or make I use business man for that matter wey go market go buy goods to sell after you buy them transport them to your office, you no go gather your expenses put for the price wey go make am a bit increase in price? Na so the political business be so after the politicians Dem win, Dem go begin to gather back their investment that is the money wey Dem spend for the campaign, electioneering, vote buying and to settle their boys wey work for them etc so that them no go loose. So tell me how Dem want to take concentrate then do their work? The other wey round country man wey dey reason to collect him share of the cake wey the politicians them dey give because once them enter office, them don forget them coupled with this rigging wey person vote no dey count at all so why you think say them no go  collect wetin Dem see then go their way go hustle after all them fo say them no loose.These keeps repeating every election period and it seems now that it has become the culture of Nigeria politics.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: As em don sell him vote come collect 25kg of rice, no be own come better pass we wey no sell our own votes come the think sae our vote go count for the presidential election wey just happen so. I been no dey in support of selling of votes for election but this our present government and INEC don make am like sae whether you sell your vote or not, your vote no go count at the end of the election as far as sae them dey in charge. With wetin don happen for this presidential election, let us not be surprise when people refuse to vote again or decide to sell their votes instead of voting their choice of candidates because of hunger. Em d so pathetic sae our country don become a failed state where everything goes. Things wey no suppose to d happen, d happen for our country and those guilty of it(corruption, abuse of power) are working freely. Each time I keep asking, when this woroworo wey d Naija politics go end
